text: Petr Pavel (; born 1 November 1961) is a Czech politician and former army general who has been the 4th President of the Czech Republic since 2023. He was Chairman of the NATO Military Committee from 2015 to 2018. He also was the Chief of the General Staff of the Czech Armed Forces from 2012 to 2015. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Generals Category:Presidents of the Czech Republic Category:Current national leaders
title: Petr Pavel
